title: Leader Board - 30 Days of JS
description: This is a DOM manipulation project with the features of night mode, responsiveness, local storage, and optimized with reusable JS code.

title: World Countries List
description: A dynamic list of world countries with search and sorting functionality. Users can search countries by starting or containing words, and toggle sorting between ascending or descending order.

title: Solar System Weight Calculator
description: This project allows users to input their weight and select a planet. The mass is calculated, and the corresponding planet image is displayed using DOM manipulation and event handling.

title: Omelette Recipe Page
description: A detailed blog page showcasing an omelette recipe with step-by-step instructions, ingredients, and cooking tips.

title: T-Shirt Shopping Cart
description: A shopping cart for a T-shirt where the price updates dynamically based on selected color and size. This is a responsive DOM project.

title: Meme Generator
description: A fun meme generator that displays random memes when the user clicks a button.

title: Image Search App
description: An image search app that fetches images from the Unsplash API with pagination functionality.
